Title: One Foot in Heaven
Cast: Fredric March, Martha Scott, Beulah Bondi, Gene Lockhart, Elisabeth Fraser, Harry Davenport, Laura Hope Crews, Grant Mitchell, Moroni Olsen, Frankie Thomas, Jerome Cowan, Ernest Cossart, Nana Bryant, Carlotta Jelm, Peter Caldwell
Plot: Episodic look at the life of a minister and his family as they move from one parish to another. Episodic look at the life of a minister and his family as they move from one parish to another.
Keywords: minister, silent movie theatre, orchestral music score, husband wife relationship, family relationships
Location: First United Methodist Church - 6817 Franklin Avenue, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA

Writer: Casey Robinson (screen play), Hartzell Spence (from the book by)
Description: Directed by Irving Rapper.  With Fredric March, Martha Scott, Beulah Bondi, Gene Lockhart. Episodic look at the life of a minister and his family as they move from one parish to another.
